sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"支持，支援，拥护"之意。
means: back ： 通常指对论点、行动、事业等的强有力支持。
uphold ： 既可指积极努力对陷入困境者的支持，也可指给某人在行动、道义或信仰上的支持。
support ： 含义广泛，多指在道义上或物质上支持某人，也可指对某项事业的支持。
sustain ： 侧重指连续不断的支持。
advocate ： 多指通过写文章或发表演说等来支持或拥护，往往暗示提倡某事或为某事辩护。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"帮助，支持"之意。
means: help ： 最普通用词，可以与aid和assistance换用。help强调使受助者达到目的或侧重受助者对帮助的需要。
aid比help正式，侧重受助者处于困难或危险境地急需救助。
assistance ： 正式用词，通常指帮助完成不太重要的那一部分工作。
support ： 强调在迫切需要时给予支持或鼓励。

word_mean: 支柱，支持器，托：协助某部分或结构保持一定位置的装置或器具
支持，支承：在牙科学中，指牙列支托的基质
为维护围岩稳定和保障工作安全采用的杆件式结构物或整体式构筑物。

sentence.Network_en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentence.Network_cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentence.Network_en: Loyalty and support became the bywords of the day.
sentence.Network_cn: 忠诚和支持成了那个时代人们时常挂在嘴边的词儿。

sentence.Network_en: As pope he won wide support for his strict orthodoxy.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为教皇他严守正统教义，赢得了广泛的支持。

支持;维持
其他释义

其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the sense 'tolerate, put up with'): from Old French supporter, from Latin supportare, from sub- 'from below' + portare 'carry'

entry.def: If you support someone or their ideas or aims, you agree with them, and perhaps help them because you want them to succeed.

example.ex: The vice president insisted that he supported the hard-working people of New York...
example.tran: 副总统坚称他支持辛勤工作的纽约人。

example.ex: The National Union of Mineworkers pressed the party to support a total ban on imported coal.
example.tran: 全国矿工工会向该政党施压，要求其同意全面禁止煤炭进口。

entry.def: If you give support to someone during a difficult or unhappy time, you are kind to them and help them.

example.ex: It was hard to come to terms with her death after all the support she gave to me and the family...
example.tran: 她曾经给予我和家人莫大的帮助，她的死讯令人难以接受。

example.ex: We hope to continue to have her close support and friendship.
example.tran: 我们希望她能继续大力支持，并能与她维持亲密友谊。

entry.def: Financial support is money provided to enable an organization to continue. This money is usually provided by the government.

example.ex: ...the government's proposal to cut agricultural support by only about 15%.
example.tran: 仅削减约 15%的农业拨款的政府提案

entry.def: If you support someone, you provide them with money or the things that they need.

example.ex: I have children to support, money to be earned, and a home to be maintained...
example.tran: 我要抚养孩子，挣钱养家。

example.ex: She sold everything she'd ever bought in order to support herself through art school.
example.tran: 为了供自己读完艺术学校，她把过去购置的所有东西都卖掉了。

entry.def: If a fact supports a statement or a theory, it helps to show that it is true or correct.

example.ex: The Freudian theory about daughters falling in love with their father has little evidence to support it.
example.tran: 弗洛伊德关于女儿恋父的理论缺乏依据。

entry.def: If something supports an object, it is underneath the object and holding it up.

example.ex: ...the thick wooden posts that supported the ceiling...
example.tran: 支撑天花板的粗木柱子

example.ex: Let your baby sit on the floor propped up with plenty of cushions to support him.
example.tran: 让宝宝坐在地板上，多放几个垫子让他倚靠。

entry.def: A support is a bar or other object that supports something.
If you support yourself, you prevent yourself from falling by holding onto something or by leaning on something.

example.ex: He supported himself by means of a nearby post.

entry.def: If you support a sports team, you always want them to win and perhaps go regularly to their games.

entry.tran: (音乐会、演出的)助演演员，助演乐队
entry.def: At a concert or show, the support or the support act is a less well-known person or band who performs before the main person or band.

means.word_mean: 1. the activity of providing for or maintaining by supplying with money or necessities;

sentences.sentence: "his support kept the family together"
"they gave him emotional support during difficult times"

means.word_mean: 2. aiding the cause or policy or interests of;

sentences.sentence: "the president no longer had the support of his own party"
"they developed a scheme of mutual support"

means.word_mean: 3. something providing immaterial support or assistance to a person or cause or interest;

sentences.sentence: "the policy found little public support"
"his faith was all the support he needed"
"the team enjoyed the support of their fans"

means.word_mean: 4. a military operation (often involving new supplies of men and materiel) to strengthen a military force or aid in the performance of its mission;

sentences.sentence: "they called for artillery support"

means.word_mean: 5. documentary validation;

sentences.sentence: "his documentation of the results was excellent"
"the strongest support for this this view is the work of Jones"

means.word_mean: 6. the financial means whereby one lives;

sentences.sentence: "each child was expected to pay for their keep"
"he applied to the state for support"
"he could no longer earn his own livelihood"

means.word_mean: 7. supporting structure that holds up or provides a foundation;

sentences.sentence: "the statue stood on a marble support"

means.word_mean: 8. the act of bearing the weight of or strengthening;

sentences.sentence: "he leaned against the wall for support"

means.word_mean: 9. a subordinate musical part; provides background for more important parts
10. any device that bears the weight of another thing;

sentences.sentence: "there was no place to attach supports for a shelf"

means.word_mean: 11. financial resources provided to make some project possible;

sentences.sentence: "the foundation provided support for the experiment"

means.word_mean: 1. give moral or psychological support, aid, or courage to;

sentences.sentence: "She supported him during the illness"
"Her children always backed her up"

means.word_mean: 2. support materially or financially;

sentences.sentence: "he does not support his natural children"
"The scholarship supported me when I was in college"

means.word_mean: 3. be behind; approve of;

sentences.sentence: "He plumped for the Labor Party"
"I backed Kennedy in 1960"

means.word_mean: 4. be the physical support of; carry the weight of;

sentences.sentence: "The beam holds up the roof"
"He supported me with one hand while I balanced on the beam"
"What's holding that mirror?"

means.word_mean: 5. establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts;

sentences.sentence: "his story confirmed my doubts"
"The evidence supports the defendant"

means.word_mean: 6. adopt as a belief;

sentences.sentence: "I subscribe to your view on abortion"

means.word_mean: 7. support with evidence or authority or make more certain or confirm;

sentences.sentence: "The stories and claims were born out by the evidence"

means.word_mean: 8. argue or speak in defense of;

sentences.sentence: "She supported the motion to strike"

means.word_mean: 9. play a subordinate role to (another performer);

sentences.sentence: "Olivier supported Gielgud beautifully in the second act"

means.word_mean: 10. be a regular customer or client of;

sentences.sentence: "We patronize this store"
"Our sponsor kept our art studio going for as long as he could"

means.word_mean: 11. put up with something or somebody unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot bear his constant criticism"
"The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks"
"he learned to tolerate the heat"
"She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

stems_affixes.type_exp: 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sup在下面;随后+plic重叠+ant……的→双膝重叠跪下→哀求的
sup在下面;随后+plant种植→种在下面,把上面的取代
sup在下面;随后+plic重叠+ate表动词→[膝盖]重叠跪下→恳求
sup在下面;随后+port运,带→带来支持
sup在下面;随后+pose放→放下去想→猜想
sup在下面;随后+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: They lack consistent support from peers.
Sam has a big family to support
How did Donna make extra money to support herself?

means.word_mean: 支撑; 撑扶; 托住; 支持

sentences.en: Bill had to support Jill or she would have fallen to the floor.
sentences.cn: 比尔只得扶住吉尔, 不然她就会摔倒在地。

means.word_mean: 维持

sentences.en: Air, food and drink are necessary to support life.
sentences.cn: 空气、食物和水是维持生命所必需的。

sentences.en: She couldn't support life without friends.
sentences.cn: 没有朋友她就过不了日子。

means.word_mean: 赞助; 赞成; 供养

sentences.en: Our school is supported by the government.
sentences.cn: 政府赞助我校的办学费用。

means.word_mean: 经常光顾; 为…捧场

sentences.en: Which football team do you support?

means.word_mean: 忍受

sentences.cn: 我忍受不了这样的热度。

means.word_mean: 支撑, 承受, 支持, 赞助

sentences.en: Your support has meant a lot to me during this difficult time.
sentences.cn: 在这困难时期, 你的支持给了我很大的帮助。

sentences.en: The plan was canceled because of lack of support.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏赞助, 这项计划被取消了。

means.word_mean: 支撑物, 支柱, 支座, 支架
给予帮助[同情]的人

sentences.en: Jimmy was a great support to us when father died.
sentences.cn: 父亲死后, 吉米给我们的帮助是巨大的。

jushi.english: He had to be supported home.
This evidence supports my argument that she is guilty.
jushi.chinese: 这一证据支持了我认为她有罪的推定。

jushi.english: Support the army and cherish the people.
